frameset.edef: To be amuse or be Distracted

example.parse: (S (NP-TPC-2 (PRON_1P نحن)) (VP (PRT (NEG_PART ما)) (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:1P زلنا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (S (VP (IV1P+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I نتلهى) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-2)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN القُرَنْ)) (NP (PUNC -LRB-) (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM جمع) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN قرنة)) (PUNC -RRB-))) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN قرنة) (NP (NOUN_PROP شهوان)))) (PP (PREP الى) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN خلية) (NP (NOUN_PROP حمد)))) (NP-ADV (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC وصولا)) (PP (PREP الى) (NP (NOUN_QUANT+CASE_DEF_GEN كل) (NP (DET+NOUN الخلايا) (CONJ و) (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN القُرن))))))))))) (PUNC .))
